text: The men's 4 x 200 metre freestyle relay competition of the swimming events at the 2015 Southeast Asian Games was held on 7 June at the OCBC Aquatic Centre in Singapore. ==Schedule== All times are Singapore Standard Time (UTC+08:00) {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! title: Swimming at the 2015 Southeast Asian Games – Men's 4 × 200 metre freestyle relay
